name: Sprinters
description:
On your marks, Set, Go!
Sprint your way to be the fastest animal on earth.
Sprinters is a Speed tap Game with one touch button.
Beat your competitors and challenge your friends to be the fastest tapper in the world!
In the game included 18 animal sprinters, which can be upgrade to reach even higher speed.

Instruction:
Tap to run. Gain speed with faster tapping.
